name: Runes of Mystery
description:
EPIC CHALLENGES

Explore the history of these mysterious lands with over 4,000 quest: Fight your character against the dark forces of chaos and take on other players in gripping PvE battles. Unlimited fame and magical items await you as a reward.

PERSONALIZED AND MYSTERIOUS

Human or Elf - The choice is entirely yours! Also specialize in eight different classes, match them together and unlock more special skill trees. Upgrade your equipment with the most powerful runes and shape your character exactly the way you want it.

HOME SWEET HOME

You will have what you call your own home! Customize your house and the castle where your clan is located. Celebrate your victories here and get ready for the next fight with your friends.

MINI GAMES AND MORE

Awaits solo players and clans, with numerous mini-game rewards.
  • Win races with fast horses.
  • Collect monster cards and transfer traits to your character.
  • Get powerfull items to help your character grow with rich mini-games.
and more will be waiting for you in the world of Runes of Mystery!
